subTitle: Have questions about Nutriwatt? Find answers to common questions about our health and nutrition tracking apps.

faqs.question: What is the difference between Nutriwatt Sport and Nutriwatt?
faqs.answer: Nutriwatt Sport is designed for athletes and sport enthusiasts with advanced features including Strava integration, detailed nutrient tracking, personalized recommendations, and activity-based nutrition adjustments. Nutriwatt is our standard app for everyday use, offering essential nutrition tracking features in a simple, intuitive interface perfect for normal daily health tracking.

faqs.question: How does the Strava integration work in Nutriwatt Sport?
faqs.answer: Nutriwatt Sport seamlessly connects with your Strava account to automatically sync your workout data. The app tracks calories burned during your activities and adjusts your daily nutrition recommendations based on your actual physical activity. This ensures your nutrition goals align perfectly with your training schedule.

faqs.question: Is my personal data and nutrition information secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. We take data privacy seriously. All your personal information, nutrition logs, and health data are encrypted and stored securely. We never share your data with third parties, and you have full control over your information at all times.

faqs.question: Can I use Nutriwatt without being an athlete?
faqs.answer: Definitely! Nutriwatt is designed for everyone, whether you're a professional athlete, fitness enthusiast, or simply someone looking to improve their nutrition. The app helps you track meals, understand your nutrient intake, and make better food choices regardless of your activity level.

faqs.question: How accurate are the automatic nutrient calculations?
faqs.answer: Our app uses a comprehensive food database with verified nutritional information. The calculations for calories, proteins, carbs, fats, and essential nutrients are based on standard nutritional data. For best results, we recommend logging your meals accurately and using the app's food database.

faqs.question: Are the Nutriwatt apps free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes! Both Nutriwatt Sport and Nutriwatt are completely free to download and use. We believe everyone should have access to quality nutrition tracking tools to support their health and wellness journey.
